review: Very easy to use and set up love it!!
author: mimi

review: Made my tv a smart tv.  Very easy to use and set up.  Will probably get another.  Prefer it over my chrome cast.
author: Rowdy

review: works better than expected.  Better the other small stick
author: Marvin Vanderventer

review: Maybe I haven't figured out how to use all of the features but it seems like this just turns your tv into a smart tv. Yes, you can access movies but you have to pay for them. On average $19.99 for the more current ones. I don't know what the hype is on these. I'm going to do more research on this item.
author: Belle Capacete

review: I really like the fire stick, except for the  fact that for the  main tv I  bought it for it did not  work. But I  decided to  keep it for another tv,even though I don't really  watch the tv in that room.i know i could exchange the tv but the size makes it impossible for me.
author: Maria DeJesus

review: Oh, Man!!!!!!!  the best thing invented since the remote!!!!
author: peggy "peggy"

review: Not happy. I pay for Netflix and having the Amazon Fire TV stick ---- I have to pay to watch certain things.  WHY??
author: Mary Hoyt
